text: I felt this one pretty good.  I'm located 25 miles south of the quake.  Slow easy rocking for about 6 seconds.  This one is pretty rare for the Geysers.  The Geysers is one of the most active areas of Northern California with small earthquakes hitting the area nearly every week.  A 4.4 quake is on the large size for The Geysers.  The UGSG Website says the largest quake ever to be recorded there was 4.5.
title: Good sized quake at the California Geysers.
